entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of drizzle. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 22 April 2023
